alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 6:20PM EDT until May 01 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...St. Marys and Calvert Counties. * WHEN...Until 2 AM EDT Monday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, yards are flooded on Saint George Island, and water will begin covering the road leading to the island, especially if there is wave action. At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Chesapeake Beach is at 1:34 AM. The next high tide at Piney Point is at 11:59 PM. The next high tide at Point Lookout is at 10:53 PM. The next high tide at Solomons Island is at 11:50 PM. The next high tide at Coltons Point is at 12:35 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 PM 3.2 1.6 2.1 2.0 Minor 01/11 AM 2.4 0.8 1.1 2.0 None 01/11 PM 2.4 0.8 1.0 2.0 None 02/12 PM 2.1 0.5 0.7 2.0 None 03/01 AM 2.0 0.4 0.4 1.0 None 03/01 PM 1.8 0.2 0.4 1.0 None Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 01/01 AM 2.3 0.9 1.1 0.5 None 01/03 PM 2.1 0.7 1.0 0.5 None 02/02 AM 2.1 0.7 0.8 0.5 None 02/02 PM 1.8 0.4 0.7 0.5 None 03/02 AM 1.7 0.3 0.3 0.5 None 03/03 PM 1.2 -0.2 0.1 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/11 PM 3.3 1.8 2.0 1.0 Minor 01/12 PM 2.3 0.8 1.0 1.0 None 01/11 PM 2.2 0.7 0.9 1.0 None 02/12 PM 2.0 0.5 0.7 1.0 None 03/12 AM 1.8 0.3 0.4 1.0 None 03/01 PM 1.6 0.1 0.3 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
